instructions.default: Heat gently in a pan with a splash of water or stock to steam.
instructions.Frozen Pint: Defrost. Heat gently in a pan with a splash of water or stock to steam.
instructions.Frozen Pint / Walnuts: Defrost. Heat gently in a pan with a splash of water or stock to steam.
instructions.Frozen Pint / NO Nuts: Defrost. Heat gently in a pan with a splash of water or stock to steam.
